data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The main reason some people choose celebrities as idols is due to the celebrity effect. The celebrity effect is the ability of famous people to influence others. Companies can use that star power and influence to boost their own products and services. Celebrities can add credibility and glamour to a brand. Celebrities are exposed under the spotlight, so they can be seen by the public. They would always behave properly, and from the public perception, the celebrity is someone who has good characteristics and is good to be a role model. That is why people choose celebrities as idols.
data.referenceText: What are some reasons that people choose celebrities as idols?
data.referenceTranslate: 人们选择名人作为偶像的原因有哪些?
